title: Kennan Ult Bug
body: Just got out of a game that lasted 40 minutes, during which Kennan's ult was invisible the whole time. Default skin, no clue how to reproduce it. Has anyone else had this happen?

replies.body:
Hey Amstel - 

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are investigating.
Same here, except the kennen on their team had a skin.
